symptoms.name: Interstitial keratitis
symptoms.severity: Variable, can lead to glaucoma or corneal scarring, blurring to blindness
symptoms.pattern: Usually between 5 and 20 years of age, often bilateral

symptoms.name: Eighth nerve deafness
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be high-frequency hearing loss progressing to permanent hearing loss
symptoms.pattern: Often starts between 8 and 10 years of age, but can start younger, may have sudden onset

symptoms.name: Hutchinson's teeth
symptoms.severity: Malformed teeth (peg-shaped, notched incisors; mulberry molars)
symptoms.pattern: Dental defects apparent with eruption of permanent incisors and molars around 6 years of age

physical_findings: Peg-shaped, notched upper central incisors (Hutchinson incisors)
Mulberry molars (first molars with many small cusps)

imaging_findings.Panoramic radiograph: May show restorations in posterior teeth and absence of some deciduous teeth
